TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CategoryEditor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a custom CategoryEditor to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConsumesProperty(class System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry propertyEntry) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor>.
Docs.summary: Determines which properties are edited by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor">.
Docs.returns: `true` if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute CreateEditorAttribute(class System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor editor) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> for which to create a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>.
Docs.summary: Creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> for the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute CreateEditorAttribute(class System.Type categoryEditorType) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> type for which to create the new <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>.
Docs.summary: Creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> for the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor> type.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate"> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetImage(valuetype System.Windows.Size desiredSize) cil managed

Docs.param: The desired [T.Systems.Windows.Size](assetId:///T.Systems.Windows.Size?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) of the image to return.
Docs.summary: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object"> that the host can display in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Object"> to display in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.

Docs.summary: Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the editor category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
